profile.name: Demia
profile.title: Fortress of Steel Demia
profile.story: Demia Si Ziltrion. The commander of the Guardian Knights of Orvelia. She is a mighty and dignified knight who wields a lance and a giant shield. It is said that penetrating her shield is next to impossible. As a knight commander, she cherishes her subordinates, and is prepared to perform any task in service of her land. Having felt the recent change of the atmosphere within the royal palace, she hopes to quickly appoint Clause as the next commander so that she may protect Scarlet from the aggression of the nobles.

1.name: Penetration
1.description:
Throws a spear at the farthest enemy, dealing [ffc800]157*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+121.2% ATK[-] as Physical DMG, [fa96fa]pulling them in front of you[-]. Then deals [ffc800]105*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+80.8% ATK[-] as Physical DMG to enemies within range and [fa96fa]stuns[-] them for [64ffff]1sec[-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

2.name: Will to Win
2.description:
For [64ffff]5sec[-], your Physical Block Chance is increased by [64ff64]800[-]. When you block, deals [ffc800]95*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+72.6% ATK[-] as Physical DMG to nearby enemies and reduces their ATK by [ff6464]25%[-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

3.name: Steel Fortress
3.description:
For [64ffff]5sec[-], increases all allies’ Physical Block Chance by [64ff64]400[-] and prepares to leap.
While preparing, becomes [fa96fa]immune to status ailments[-]. When you block, increases the leap attack’s DMG by [64ff64]8%[-] and deals [ffc800]126*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+96.8% ATK[-] as Physical DMG to the attacker.
When preparation ends, leaps to the nearest enemy, dealing [ffc800]465*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+357.5% ATK[-] as Physical DMG and [fa96fa]stuns[-] them for [64ffff]1sec[-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

uw.name: The Blue Light, Arpheus
uw.description:
Increases all allies’ Physical Defense by {0}%.
On block, has a {1}% chance to restore {2} Mana to yourself and reduce the cooldown of all skills by 1 sec.
uw.story: One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than diamond.

1.name: Aura of Protection
1.description: [Penetration] Increases ACC by 750, and CC ACC by {0} for the duration of skill.
1.story: A stone known to protect one's soul from being absorbed by evil. It only shines for a while at dawn, so it's hard to find. One day, when Demia was tired from battle, a comrade put this in her hands. Even though it's a comrade that she can't ever see again... Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her vow to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

2.name: Shield of Resolution
2.description: [Will to Win] increases P.Block chance by 400 and raises the target’s P.DMG taken by {0}% for 5 sec.
2.story:
A wooden shield that Demia used as a child for practice. It's been used over a thousand times and is very worn out. 
Demia uses it to regain her composure when she feels like she has hit a limit.
Her pride as a knight of Orvelia resurfaces when she sees this old, worn-out shield.

3.name: Chest of Ziltrion
3.description: [Steel Fortress] increases DMG Boost on Block by 24% and extends the Stun duration of Leap Attack by {0} sec.
3.story:
An old Chest passed down among the Ziltrion family as an heirloom.
A photo album of all the family members, from the first to the current generation, is safeguarded by a strong spell inside this chest to protect the family's bloodline. Demia's mother is worried about her daughter, who decided to be the shield of Orvelia. Whenever Demia marches to the battlefield, she prays to this chest for her daughter's safe return.

4.name: Ring of Ziltrion
4.description: [Spearhead] recovers 40% of P.DEF every sec when blocking, and increases P.DEF gained by {0}% for 5 sec. P.DEF Boost can stack up to 5 times.
4.story:
A ring handed down to the leaders of the Ziltrion Family.
It is decorated with a big blue jewel which was bestowed to the Ziltrions by the royal family of Orvel.
It was passed down to the leaders as the symbol of the family's eternal loyalty, and these leaders became the vanguards of punishing traitors.
